document_data.name: Valtan
document_data.mainbody: '''Vkriss Valtan Leatherwings''' was a [[dragonborn]] of [[Tymanther]] and a member of [[Clan Vkriss]] in [[1479 DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Death before Dishonor|8}}
document_data.Personality: Valtan was a cunning and cutthroat businessman.
document_data.History:
At some point, Valtan lost his wife in a tragic "accident". Two days later, nearly all the prominent members of [[Clan Gethmara]] were killed in a gruesome massacre.

In 1479 DR, Valtan was the guildmaster of Djerad Thymar's weaver's guild.
